data.Name: Monica Cox
data.staff_bio: Monica Cox has been a part of ICI's research and evaluation group since 2008. She currently supports several projects evaluating programs and policy initiatives focused on employment outcomes of people with disabilities in Massachusetts. Monica also supports research on job development practices among employment specialists and is involved in research for the NextSTEP training and TA center, a service of the special initiative on disability employment by the Corporation for National and Community Service. She is a graduate of the University of California with a degree in Sociology.
data.staff_ed: A.B. Sociology - University of California, Davis
